name: FÄLLERAMA: Lumberjack Contest
description:
Just a small project I made for a class on artificial intelligence. I was mainly trying out machine learning with Unity ML-Agents and decided to make it into a small game. The AI is far from perfect, but it manages to get the job done, most of the time.

Can you beat it and chop down trees faster?

Controls:

  • A/S: Move forward/backward
  • Left/Right Arrow: Turn left/right
  • Space: Use Axe - Hold to build up force and release to swing
  • Escape (not in fullscreen mode)/Tab: Menu/Pause
